meanings.sent1: The nonantigenic substance did not provoke any reaction from the immune system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use nonantigenic materials in certain medical procedures to avoid triggering immune responses.
meanings.sent3: The nonantigenic jellybean went unnoticed by the immune system, much to its disappointment.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like a nonantigenic shield, deflecting any immune responses.
meanings.sent5: The nonantigenic nature of the fabric made it ideal for use in sensitive skin products.

meanings.definition: Not capable of triggering an immune response
meanings.sent1: The nonantigenic vaccine was designed to be safe for individuals with allergies.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are working on developing nonantigenic alternatives to traditional vaccines.
meanings.sent3: The nonantigenic cat was a hit at the allergy-friendly pet show.
meanings.sent4: His words were like nonantigenic bullets, harmless and ineffective.
meanings.sent5: The nonantigenic properties of the plant made it a popular choice for landscaping in allergy-prone areas.
